format:
Description:


Generate a new root Certificate and a corresponding private key encrypted with the passphrase. THis root certificate will be used when creating new server and client certificates


Note: Previous generate root certificate and private key will be lost!


Do not forget your passphrase. It will not be stored on this system

func:
msg.payload = 'pkcs12 -export -out /data/files/' + msg.cn + '.p12 -inkey /data/files/' + msg.cn + '.key -in /data/files/' + msg.cn + '.crt -password pass:' + msg.passphrase;
return msg;

name: Headers
Download
format:
<script>

(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        if (msg && msg.topic && msg.timestamp) {
            //If file download does not work NR may get into a loop and tries to download again on refresh.
            //By check the button push timestamp the loop breakes
            if(msg.topic === "download" && new Date().getTime() - msg.timestamp < 500 ) {
                console.log("Debug");
                window.location.href = msg.payload;
				scope.send({
					topic: msg.topic,
					payload: msg.payload
				});                
                return;
            }
        }
    });
})(scope);
</script>
